newsitem.title: USA: Centex sees record 97 for home building unit.
newsitem.headline: Centex sees record 97 for home building unit.

text.p: Centex Corp said on Wednesday it expects its home building division to report a record performance for 1997 and results from its financial services operations should improve substantially over those for fiscal 1996.
Centex also said that, if interest rates "remain at or near current levels, the company should report record earnings for fiscal 1997."
However, it noted that slower home orders in the second quarter has continued in the first few weeks of the third quarter and could impact Home Building earnings later in the year.
Earlier today, the company reported second quarter earnings of $0.96, compared with analysts' estimates of $0.83 and year-ago earnings of $0.50.

The company said home building revenues rose 25 percent in the six months from the 1995 period. Revenues from financial services totaled $78.9 million in the six-month period, 32 percent higher $59.9 million a year ago, the company said.
